active_bounties.title: Create 100 New Vocabulary Words for Technology Domain
active_bounties.description: Develop 100 new vocabulary terms related to modern technology, computing, and digital communication. Each term should include pronunciation, definition, and example usage.

active_bounties.title: Develop Grammar Rules for Conditional Statements
active_bounties.description: Create a comprehensive set of grammar rules for expressing conditional statements (if/then constructions) in Lingua Nova. Include examples, edge cases, and integration with existing tense system.

active_bounties.title: Design Flashcard App for Mobile Learning
active_bounties.description: Design and develop a mobile application for learning Lingua Nova vocabulary using flashcards. The app should include spaced repetition, progress tracking, and audio pronunciation.

completed_bounties.title: Create Basic Pronunciation Guide
completed_bounties.description: Develop a comprehensive pronunciation guide for Lingua Nova, including audio examples and common pronunciation challenges for English speakers.
